statements: SELECT * FROM KeywordFrequency;
SELECT article_id, keyword, frequency FROM KeywordFrequency;
SELECT keyword, frequency FROM KeywordFrequency WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM KeywordFrequency ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT keyword, frequency FROM KeywordFrequency WHERE frequency > 10;
SELECT * FROM KeywordFrequency WHERE frequency > 5 ORDER BY keyword ASC, frequency DESC;
SELECT article_id, keyword FROM KeywordFrequency WHERE keyword LIKE '%data%' AND frequency BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT DISTINCT keyword, COUNT(keyword) AS keyword_count FROM KeywordFrequency GROUP BY keyword HAVING keyword_count > 3;
SELECT keyword, SUM(frequency) AS total_frequency FROM KeywordFrequency GROUP BY keyword ORDER BY total_frequency DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM KeywordFrequency WHERE article_id IN (SELECT article_id FROM KeywordFrequency WHERE keyword = 'database' AND frequency > 20);
SELECT * FROM article WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM article WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT id, keyword, frequency FROM keyword_frequency WHERE frequency > 100;
SELECT content FROM article WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, author, publication_date, title FROM article ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM article WHERE title = 'Lorem Ipsum'
SELECT id, title FROM article ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM article GROUP BY author HAVING total_articles > 5
SELECT keyword, frequency FROM keyword_frequency WHERE article_id = 101
SELECT id, UPPER(title) AS uppercase_title FROM article
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE publish_date = '2021-12-01';
SELECT keyword, frequency FROM keyword_occurrences WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM bias_trends WHERE frequency_count < 1000;
SELECT * FROM keyword_occurrences WHERE frequency BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY keyword ASC;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY title ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT MAX(frequency) AS max_frequency, keyword FROM keyword_occurrences GROUP BY keyword ORDER BY max_frequency DESC
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, frequency_count FROM bias_trends WHERE frequency_count > 100 ORDER BY frequency_count DESC
SELECT title, content, publish_date FROM articles WHERE title LIKE '%technology%' AND content LIKE '%innovation%' LIMIT 5
SELECT keyword, count(*) AS occurrences FROM keyword_occurrences GROUP BY keyword ORDER BY occurrences DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM keyword_frequency;
SELECT keyword, frequency_count FROM keyword_frequency ORDER BY frequency_count DESC;
SELECT article_text, publish_date FROM article WHERE author='John Smith';
SELECT keyword_name, language FROM keyword WHERE language='English' ORDER BY keyword_name ASC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_date FROM bias_trend WHERE trend_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM keyword_frequency;
SELECT keyword, frequency_count FROM keyword_frequency WHERE frequency_count > 10 ORDER BY frequency_count DESC;
SELECT article_text, publish_date, author FROM article WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT keyword_name, language FROM keyword WHERE language = 'English' ORDER BY keyword_name ASC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, trend_date FROM bias_trend WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM article WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM article WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT keyword, frequency FROM keyword_frequency WHERE article_id = 3 ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT keyword_name FROM keyword WHERE keyword_id = 5;
SELECT keyword, trend FROM bias_trend WHERE occurrence_count > 100 ORDER BY occurrence_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM keyword_frequency ORDER BY frequency DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT article_id, keyword, frequency FROM keyword_frequency WHERE frequency > 100 ORDER BY frequency ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT keyword FROM keyword_frequency WHERE article_id IN (SELECT article_id FROM article WHERE author='John Doe');

SELECT article.title, article.author, keyword_frequency.keyword, keyword_frequency.frequency FROM article INNER JOIN keyword_frequency ON article.article_id = keyword_frequency.article_id ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM bias_trend WHERE trend='positive' AND occurrence_count >= 50 ORDER BY occurrence_count DESC;
